sentences.en: When he was very young, he began to learn to read and write.
sentences.cn: 他很小的时候就开始学习读书写字了。

sentences.en: She writes gracefully.
sentences.cn: 她字迹秀丽。

sentences.en: I have been writing this week.
sentences.cn: 本周我一直在写。

sentences.en: Let's write a notice of next Friday's meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们来写一份关于下星期五开会的通知。

sentences.en: After she wrote the melody, she asked us for criticisms.
sentences.cn: 她做好曲之后, 请我们提意见。

sentences.en: He wrote what he saw.
sentences.cn: 他写下了所看到的情况。

sentences.en: She wrote Beijing “Peking”.
sentences.cn: 她把北京写作Peking。

sentences.en: We have had another performance of the play since I wrote.
sentences.cn: 从我上次给你写信之后, 这个剧我们又演出了一次。

sentences.en: Write me, and let me know how things go.
sentences.cn: 望来信, 谈谈你那儿的情况。

sentences.en: My son wrote to say he was coming from Paris this week.
sentences.cn: 我的儿子来信说他这个星期从巴黎来。

sentences.en: She writes that she is leaving tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 她信上说她明天要走。

sentences.en: I wrote my mother a letter hurriedly.
sentences.cn: 我匆忙地给我母亲写了封信。

sentences.en: Please write us the result.
sentences.cn: 请把结果函告我们。

sentences.en: Don't forget to write all the news to me.
sentences.cn: 不要忘记把一切消息都写信告诉我。

sentences.en: She wrote Bass that his father was not well.
sentences.cn: 她给巴斯写信, 说他爸爸身体不舒服。

sentences.en: Write me when you get home.
sentences.cn: 你到家后给我写封信。

sentences.en: He wrote her to come.
sentences.cn: 他给她写信要她回来。</seg>

phrase.cizu_name: be nothing to write home about

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)be very mediocre or unexceptional
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)不值得大书特书的；不十分好的，平庸的

phrase.cizu_name: be (或 have something) written all over one (或 one'

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to convey that the presence of a particular quality or feeling is clearly revealed by a person's expression
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)全写在某人的脸上

lj.lj_ly: guilt was written all over his face.
guilt was written all over his face.

jx.jx_en_mean: (N. Amer. informal)used to convey that there is or was nothing more to be said about a matter
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)全都写上了；没有其他要说的

lj.lj_ly: we were arguing about who should pay the bill, but he pulled out a couple of hundreds and that's all she wrote.
lj.lj_ls: 我们正在争论谁该付账，但他掏出了两三张百元大钞，她也就没什么可说的了。

jx.jx_en_mean: reduce the nominal value of stock or goods
jx.jx_cn_mean: 降低…的账面价值

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly US)(when voting) add the name of someone not on the original list of candidates and vote for them
jx.jx_cn_mean: (主美)在（选票上）加写（非原定候选人）的名字；投（非原定候选人）的票

jx.jx_en_mean: (write someone/thing off)dismiss someone or something as insignificant
jx.jx_cn_mean: 把…看得无关紧要

lj.lj_ly: they were written off as a bunch of no-hopers.
lj.lj_ls: 他们作为一群没有希望的人而不被重视。

jx.jx_en_mean: cancel the record of a bad debt; acknowledge the loss of or failure to recover an asset
jx.jx_cn_mean: 勾销（不良债务等）；承认损失（资产）

lj.lj_ly: he urged the banks to write off debt owed by poorer countries.
lj.lj_ls: 他催促银行勾销穷国所欠的债务。

jx.jx_en_mean: write a full or formal account of something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 详细记叙；正式报道

lj.lj_ly: I was too tired to write up my notes.
lj.lj_ls: 我太累了，无法详细地记笔记。

jx.jx_en_mean: To set down in writing.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 写下：用文字的方式记下

jx.jx_en_mean: To reduce in rank, value, or price.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 贬低、降价：减低级别、贬低价值或价格

jx.jx_en_mean: To disparage in writing.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 写文章贬损

jx.jx_en_mean: To write in a conspicuously simple or condescending style
jx.jx_cn_mean: 浅显地写：以浅显或谦逊的风格写

lj.lj_ly: felt he had to write down to his students.
lj.lj_ls: 感觉到他必须写得浅显学生才能看懂

jx.jx_en_mean: To cast a vote by inserting (a name not listed on a ballot).
jx.jx_cn_mean: 投票给：通过插入（候选名单上未列出的名字）来投票

jx.jx_en_mean: To insert in a text or document
jx.jx_cn_mean: 加写于正文或文件中

lj.lj_ly: wrote in an apology at the end of the note.
lj.lj_ls: 在纸条末尾加上一句道歉的话

jx.jx_en_mean: To communicate with an organization by mail
jx.jx_cn_mean: 以书信联络：与某个组织以邮件通讯的方式交往

lj.lj_ly: write in with a completed entry form.
lj.lj_ls: 写信并附上填好的申请表

jx.jx_en_mean: To reduce to zero the book value of (an asset that has become worthless).
jx.jx_cn_mean: 折价：把（已变得无价值的资产的）帐面价值减低为零

jx.jx_en_mean: To cancel from accounts as a loss.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 勾销：作为亏损从帐目上勾销

jx.jx_en_mean: To consider as a loss or failure
jx.jx_cn_mean: 视为损失或失败

lj.lj_ly: wrote off the rainy first day of the vacation.
lj.lj_ls: 假期第一天就下雨真扫兴

jx.jx_en_mean: To express or compose in writing
jx.jx_cn_mean: 写出，作曲：以书面表达或创作

jx.jx_en_mean: To write in full or expanded form
jx.jx_cn_mean: 完全写出：写出全称或完整的形式

lj.lj_ly: All abbreviations are to be written out.
lj.lj_ls: 所有的缩写都要完整地写出来

jx.jx_en_mean: To write a report or description of, as for publication.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 报导：如为公布、出版而写报告或描写

jx.jx_en_mean: To bring (a journal, for example) up to date.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 写日志：把（如，日志）等补写到最近的日期

jx.jx_en_mean: To overstate the value of (assets).
jx.jx_cn_mean: 对资产高估：过高估评（一笔资产）的价值

jx.jx_en_mean: To report (someone) in writing, as for breaking the law
jx.jx_cn_mean: （写传票）告发：写传票告发（某人）违反法规

jx.jx_en_mean: To set one's own terms or course of action entirely according to one's own needs or wishes
jx.jx_cn_mean: 自订计划，自行决定：按照某人自己的需求或愿望决定做事、行动的步骤和计划

lj.lj_ly: an open-ended and generous scholarship that lets recipients write their own ticket.
lj.lj_ls: 让受领者自行决定的无限额且大笔的奖学金

entry.def: When you write something on a surface, you use something such as a pen or pencil to produce words, letters, or numbers on the surface.

example.ex: If you'd like one, simply write your name and address on a postcard and send it to us...
example.tran: 如果你想要一个的话，只要把姓名、住址写在一张明信片上寄给我们就行。

example.ex: They were still trying to teach her to read and write...
example.tran: 他们还在试图教她读书写字。

entry.def: If you write something such as a book, a poem, or a piece of music, you create it and record it on paper or perhaps on a computer.

example.ex: I had written quite a lot of orchestral music in my student days...
example.tran: 我在学生时代创作过很多管弦乐作品。

example.ex: Finding a volunteer to write the computer program isn't a problem...
example.tran: 找个志愿者编这个计算机程序不成问题。

entry.def: Someone who writes creates books, stories, or articles, usually for publication.
entry.tran: 写作，著述（通常以出版为目的）

example.ex: She writes for many papers, including the Sunday Times...
example.tran: 她给包括《星期日泰晤士报》在内的很多报纸撰稿。

entry.def: When you write to someone or write them a letter, you give them information, ask them something, or express your feelings in a letter. In American English, you can also write someone.
entry.tran: 写(信);给…写信(美国英语亦可用 write someone)

example.ex: Many people have written to me on this subject...
example.tran: 很多人给我写信探讨这个问题。

example.ex: She had written him a note a couple of weeks earlier...
example.tran: 她几周前给他写过一个便条。

entry.def: If someone writes that something is the case, they say it in a letter, book, or article.

example.ex: 'Some six months later,' Freud writes, 'Hans had got over his jealousy.'...
example.tran: “大约6个月后，”弗洛伊德写道，“汉斯克服了他的嫉妒心理。”

example.ex: A few days later he wrote that he had hopes of a staff job.
example.tran: 几天后，他写信说他有望得到一份行政工作。

entry.def: When someone writes something such as a cheque, receipt, or prescription, they put the necessary information on it and usually sign it.

example.ex: Snape wrote a receipt with a gold fountain pen...
example.tran: 斯内普用金笔开了一张收据。

example.ex: I'll write you a cheque in a moment.
example.tran: 我过会儿给你开张支票。

entry.def: If you write to a computer or a disk, you record data on it.

example.ex: You should write-protect all disks that you do not usually need to write to.
example.tran: 你应该对你通常不需要写入内容的磁盘进行写保护。

means.word_mean: 3. have (one's written work) issued for publication;

sentences.sentence: "How many books did Georges Simenon write?"
"She published 25 books during her long career"
"He wrote that he would be coming soon"

means.word_mean: 7. mark or trace on a surface;

sentences.sentence: "The artist wrote Chinese characters on a big piece of white paper"
"boot-up instructions are written on the hard disk"

means.word_mean: 9. write or name the letters that comprise the conventionally accepted form of (a word or part of a word);

sentences.sentence: "He spelled the word wrong in this letter"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wrītan 'score, form (letters) by carving, write', of Germanic origin; related to German reissen 'sketch, drag'

sentences.cn: 有些国家的儿童到了六岁才开始读书写字。
sentences.en: In some countries children don't start learning to read and write until they are six.

sentences.cn: 请用自来水笔在纸的正反两面书写。
sentences.en: Please write in pen on both sides of the paper.

sentences.cn: 我没有笔可以写字。
sentences.en: I haven't got anything to write with.

sentences.cn: 请把名字写在纸的顶端。
sentences.en: Write your name at the top of the paper.

sentences.cn: 老师把答案写在黑板上。
sentences.en: The teacher wrote the answers on the board.

sentences.cn: b错写成d了。
sentences.en: The ‘b ’ had been wrongly written as a ‘d ’.

sentences.cn: 写小说、写歌、写散文、编电脑程序等
sentences.en: to write a novel/a song/an essay/a computer program, etc.

sentences.cn: 他希望有一天写一部关于自己经历的书。
sentences.en: He hopes to write a book about his experiences one day.

sentences.cn: 她必须就这个项目写一份报告。
sentences.en: She had to write a report on the project.

sentences.cn: 《伦敦郊野》是谁写的？
sentences.en: Who was ‘London Fields ’ written by?

sentences.cn: 威尔第最早写的是哪一部歌剧？
sentences.en: Which opera did Verdi write first?

sentences.cn: 我本想去旅行，然后把见闻写下来。
sentences.en: I wanted to travel and then write about it.

sentences.cn: 他为《纽约客》杂志撰稿。
sentences.en: He writes for the ‘New Yorker ’ (= works as a writer) .

sentences.cn: 写这个的时候尚未作出决定。
sentences.en: No decision has been made at the time of writing .

sentences.cn: 她为他写了几首诗。
sentences.en: She wrote him several poems.

sentences.cn: 再见！别忘了写信。
sentences.en: Bye! Don't forget to write.

sentences.cn: 她给他往法国写信。
sentences.en: She wrote to him in France.

sentences.cn: 如果你想要一个的话，只要把姓名、住址写在一张明信片上寄给我们就行。

sentences.en: Jay wanted to write...

sentences.en: She writes for many papers, including the Sunday Times...

sentences.en: Many people have written to me on this subject...

sentences.en: She had written him a note a couple of weeks earlier...

sentences.en: 'Some six months later,' Freud writes, 'Hans had got over his jealousy.'...

sentences.en: A few days later he wrote that he had hopes of a staff job.

sentences.cn: 斯内普用金笔开了一张收据。
sentences.en: Snape wrote a receipt with a gold fountain pen...

sentences.cn: 我过会儿给你开张支票。
sentences.en: I'll write you a cheque in a moment.

sentences.cn: 你应该对你通常不需要写入内容的磁盘进行写保护。
sentences.en: You should write-protect all disks that you do not usually need to write to.

sentences.cn: 再见！别忘了写信。
sentences.en: Bye! Don't forget to write.

sentences.cn: 她给他往法国写信。
sentences.en: She wrote to him in France.

sentences.cn: 你能写信来确认你的预订项目吗？
sentences.en: Can you write and confirm your booking?

sentences.cn: 你外出期间给我写信。
sentences.en: Write me while you're away.

sentences.cn: 他给我写信说他将于星期一到达。
sentences.en: He wrote me that he would be arriving Monday.

sentences.cn: 他们写信来感谢我们赠送的礼物。
sentences.en: They wrote thanking us for the present.

sentences.cn: 我要写信索取更详细的信息。
sentences.en: I'll write in for more information.

sentences.cn: 很多人给我写信探讨这个问题。
sentences.en: Many people have written to me on this subject...

sentences.cn: 几天后，他写信说他有望得到一份行政工作。
sentences.en: A few days later he wrote that he had hopes of a staff job.

sentences.cn: 第一期出版后，狄更斯写信给这个画家并建议他修改一幅图画，因为狄更斯认为其并不足够忠实于他的散文。
sentences.en: After the first installment, Dickens wrote to the artist and asked him to correct a drawing Dickens felt was not faithful enough to his prose.

sentences.cn: 在时机尚未成熟以前,我们就冒昧地写信谈及此事,对此甚表遗憾.
sentences.en: We are sorry that we have taken the liverty in writing you prematurely on the subject.

sentences.cn: 向客人提供酒店信息及城市信息.
sentences.en: Provide information to guests about the hotel facilities information and city information.

sentences.cn: 你在写信给谁? 我在写信给我女朋友.
sentences.en: Who are you writing to? I'm writing to my girlfriend.

sentences.cn: 除你以外,没有人给我写信.
sentences.en: No one writes to me besides you.

sentences.cn: 你给她写信时,请代我向她致意.
sentences.en: Please send her my good wishes when you write to her.

sentences.cn: 那女孩说她每周都给家里写信.
sentences.en: The girl said that she wrote home every week.

sentences.cn: 我们写信向他求教.
sentences.en: We wrote to him for advice.

sentences.cn: 写信整洁地在答题纸2上.
sentences.en: Write it neatly on ANSWER SHEET 2.

sentences.cn: 我想明天我会写信给克里斯的.
sentences.en: I think I'll write to Chris tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 他再也没去过, 也没有写信道歉.
sentences.en: He never went again, and nor did he write to apologize.

sentences.cn: ( 你 ) 不必每天都给你母亲写信.
sentences.en: There's no necessity ( for you ) to write to your mother every single day.

sentences.cn: 我外出时,你不必麻烦给我写信.
sentences.en: Don't trouble to write when I'm gone.

sentences.cn: 我昨晚给父亲写信了, 我不能再拖延了.
sentences.en: I wrote to my father last night. I couldn't put it off any longer.
sentences.from: 英汉 - 翻译样例 - 口语

sentences.cn: 主要在办公室工作. 写信件和写报告, 还打字.
sentences.en: He works in an office . He writes letters and reports, and he types.
sentences.from: 地道口语脱口SHOW 高中超越版

sentences.cn: 我打算给商店写信,要他们解释一下这个帐单.
sentences.en: I intend to write to the shop asking for an explanation of this bill.

sentences.cn: 关于这件事我要给我区的众议院议员写信.
sentences.en: I'll write to the Congressman of my district about this.

sentences.cn: 约翰常给玛丽写信.
sentences.en: John often write mary letters . John often write letter to mary.

sentences.cn: 他要把他说的已写信给他们的谎话变为事实.
sentences.en: He would make good the false statement he had made about writing them.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 给陌生人写信总有点怪.
sentences.en: It'seems queer to be writing letters to somebody you didn't know.

sentences.cn: 她一没钱了就写信给她的父亲,于是他就给她寄一张支票.
sentences.en: Whenever she was tight spot, she'd write to her father and he'd send her a check.

sentences.cn: 杰伊想要写作。
sentences.en: Jay wanted to write...

sentences.cn: 纽曼说,“只有少数作家既足够聪明，又有足够的文学天赋去坚持新闻写作，以至于我想把新闻工作定义为‘不受读者欢迎的作家拿来嘲笑拥有大量读者的作家’的爱称。”
sentences.en: So few authors have brains enough or literary gift enough to keep their own end up in journalism. Newman wrote that I am tempted to define ‘journalism’ as‘a term of contempt applied by writers who are not read to writers who are.”

sentences.cn: 在写作的时候，男士会做什么？。
sentences.en: What does the man do when he engages in writing?.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 然而我从中学到的，以及后来在哈佛大学的写作教学生涯中一直伴随我的，是对创造性批评本质的更深一层认识。
sentences.en: But what I learned, and what  stuck with me through my time teaching writing at Harvard, was a deeper lesson about the nature of creative  criticism .
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: descent into the cold  abyss ( 深 渊 ) of oneself. ”弗兰兹 · 卡夫卡曾经说过：“写作是完全的独处，是沉入寒冷的自我深渊的过程。”
sentences.en: Franz Kafka once said:  “ Writing is  utter solitude ( 独处 ), the
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我何其幸运，能找到一个愿意在写作路上伴我同行的批评家和老师。
sentences.en: I was lucky enough to find a critic and teacher who was willing to make the journey of writing with me.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我能确定，在高中后期，我都是在没有母亲的指导下完成写作的，但对此我已经没有什么印象了。
sentences.en: I am sure I wrote essays in the later years of high school without my mother ’ s guidance, but I can ’ t recall them.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我母亲说她会教我写作，但我必须先依靠自己的力量。
sentences.en: My mother said she would help me with my writing, but first I had to help myself.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 就这样，我不再大喊大叫，虚张声势，而我的写作水平也渐渐提高了。
sentences.en: So I stopped shouting and bluffing, and slowly my writing improved.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 传统和新设立的重点项目共吸纳60多万名毕业生.
sentences.en: Traditional and the newly established key projects absorbed a total of more than 60 million graduates.

sentences.cn: 艾米莉·斯达的写作欲望与生俱来.
sentences.en: Starr was born with the desire to write.

sentences.cn: 图表的标题写作涉及到书写格式 、 语法结构 、 中心词的位置 、 缩略词、常用句式等.
sentences.en: The title and tables includes writing forms, grammatical structures, important word's position, abbreviations and sentence patterns.

sentences.cn: 学员最终将能更明白, 更热爱和更有效的参与写作工作.
sentences.en: The expected outcome would be a greater understanding, love and effectiveness in writing.

sentences.cn: 本系列的课程分为四个领域: 说明文、修辞和创意写作 、 科学写作和科技沟通.
sentences.en: Program subjects are arranged by four areas: exposition and rhetoric, creative writing, science writing, technical communication.

sentences.cn: 回到家后, 我在写作课上谈起了我旅途中的一些事情.
sentences.en: Back home, I told the students in my writing class a little about my trip.

sentences.cn: 她把北京写作 Peking.
sentences.en: She wrote Beijing " Peking " .

sentences.cn: 近年来在专业英语(ESP)文献中,论文写作受到愈来愈多的注意.
sentences.en: Recent years have seen increased attention being given to thesis writing in the ESP literature.

sentences.cn: 他首先是一个写作的人, 然后是通过小说提出问题的人.
sentences.en: He's someone who writes, above all, and through the novel asks questions.

sentences.cn: 虽然未来是不确定的, 他投身写作,卖掉了爵士乐酒巴.
sentences.en: Though the future was uncertain, he made a commitment to writing and sold his jazz bar.

sentences.cn: 现在, 我可以在网上练习写作技巧,和我的外国朋友们在网上聊天.
sentences.en: Now, I can practise writing skill and chat with my foreign friends online.

sentences.cn: 先生的写作因为文笔的简洁与明晰而闻名.
sentences.en: Mr. A's writing is famous for its simplicity and clarity.

sentences.cn: 尽管他从事保险行业, 他的兴趣爱好是写作.
sentences.en: Although he works in insurance, his passion is writing.

sentences.cn: 他以写作为生.
sentences.en: He earns his bread by writing.

sentences.cn: 良好的英语写作和沟通能力.
sentences.en: Good English writing and communication skills.

sentences.cn: 很好. 请告诉我你在英文写作方面的能力.
sentences.en: Good. Tell me something about your ability in written English.
sentences.from: 轻松英语会话---联想2000词(上)

sentences.cn: 我每天都这么做:在开车的时候, 铺床的时候, 假装写作的时候.
sentences.en: I do it every day, while I'm driving, making the bed, pretending to write.

sentences.cn: 可以更新直接在桌面上网国家学校,净写作乐趣.
sentences.en: Can be updated directly on the desktop mesh state school Record Net Writing fun.

sentences.cn: 当你完成“摘要写作”中的练习后, 就可以进行紧随其后的语言练习.
sentences.en: When you finish the exercise in Summary writing, go on to the language exercises that follow.

sentences.cn: 窦纳修还写作了一些舞台剧和广播剧.
sentences.en: Donoghue writes drama both for the stage and for radio.

sentences.cn: 写博客能让你成为更好的营销人,因为在写作中你会懂得谦虚.
sentences.en: Blogging makes you a better marketer because it teaches you humility in your writing.

sentences.cn: 作曲家写出既更易为人们理解,又不失其个人独创风格的音乐作品.
sentences.en: Composers write music that is more easily comprehensible without sacrificing originality.

sentences.cn: 这些作曲家中有的还写过教堂乐曲 、 歌剧和歌曲.
sentences.en: Some of these composers also wrote church music, opera, and songs.

sentences.cn: 每次贝多芬坐下来作曲的时候, 他都往自己的头上浇冰水.
sentences.en: Every time Beethoven sat down to write music, he poured ice water over his head.

sentences.cn: 他不但写歌词, 而且还作曲.
sentences.en: Not only does he write the words to the songs, but he also composes the music.

sentences.cn: 歌手和音乐人都能够作曲,而且他们在同一个乐队合作.
sentences.en: The singers and musicians all able to write music and work together in a band.

sentences.cn: 作曲家写完了一部作品,得由演奏者将其演奏出来, 其他人才能得以欣赏.
sentences.en: A composer writes a work, but no one can hear it is performed.

sentences.cn: 用初次看见你时我幸福的泪滴作曲.
sentences.en: Write music for you with my happy tears when I first saw you.

sentences.cn: 我们提供作曲及编曲课程, 欢迎致电或电邮与我们联络.
sentences.en: We provide professional music tutorialson song writing and arranging. Please email or call us for details.

sentences.cn: 如今, 许多作曲家除了谱写一般乐曲外,还谱写电子乐曲.
sentences.en: Today, a number of composers write electronic music as well as ordinary music.

sentences.cn: 她不仅很会演奏, 而且还会作曲.
sentences.en: She not only plays well, but also writes music.

sentences.cn: 迈克尔·克雷楚兼作曲和作词.
sentences.en: Michael Cretu is the writer of the music and writes the lyrics.

sentences.cn: 每写完一首曲子, 这位作曲家就接着写另一首.
sentences.en: As soon as a melody is finished with, the composer writes another.

sentences.cn: 布里顿生于1913年,很小就开始作曲.
sentences.en: Britten was born in 1913 and began to write music while he was still very young.

sentences.cn: 他不但歌唱得好, 而且还会作曲.
sentences.en: He sings very well, and on top of that he can also write music.

sentences.cn: 今次他更一手为这套动画包办了作词 、 作曲和主唱!
sentences.en: And Kiyoharu write the lyrics, music and sing by himself for this anime s.

sentences.cn: 伟大的爵士音乐家艾灵顿公爵作曲的手稿.
sentences.en: The papers showing music written by the great jazz musician, Duck Ellington.

sentences.cn: 他聋成这个样子,究竟是怎样从事作曲的 呢 ?
sentences.en: However does he manage to write music when he is so deaf?

sentences.cn: 他们俩一起策划组织几百年以前作曲家的作品音乐会.
sentences.en: The two men prepared programs of music written by composers hundreds of years earlier.

sentences.cn: 后来, 他参加街上乐队演奏 、 教歌并开始作曲.
sentences.en: Later, he played in street bands, taught singing and began to write music.

sentences.cn: 作曲家兼歌手PaulSimon写了一首歌就是关于格雷斯兰之行的.
sentences.en: Music writer and singer Paul Simon wrote a song about a visit to Graceland.

sentences.cn: 19世纪, 许多作曲家写过浪漫乐曲.
sentences.en: During the nineteenth century, many composers wrote romantic music.

sentences.cn: 除了其他作品外,这位多产的作曲家写了三步交响乐, 四部协奏曲和一部歌剧.
sentences.en: The prolific composer wrote three symphonies, four concertos and an opera, among other works.

sentences.cn: 她作曲子,他写歌词.
sentences.en: She wrote the music and he wrote the book.

sentences.cn: 胡姆普丁克,恩格尔伯特1854-1921德国作曲家,作品有童话歌剧汉塞尔和格丽塔尔 ( 1893年 )
sentences.en: German composer who wrote the fairy tale opera Hansel and Gretel ( 1893 ).

sentences.cn: 这首赞歌是希腊一位名不见经传的作曲家为1896年的雅典奥运会创作的。
sentences.en: The hymn was written by an obscure Greek composer for the 1896 Athens Olympics.

sentences.cn: 我刚刚找到了更多时间来作曲。
sentences.en: I was just finding more time to write music.

sentences.cn: 他录制的这些歌是由几名酷爱音乐的作曲家谱写的。
sentences.en: The songs he recorded were written by a small coterie of dedicated writers.

sentences.cn: 手稿是作曲家亲笔写的。
sentences.en: The manuscripts were written in the composer's own hand.

Sentence.sentence: What Barth wrote decades ago is even truer today.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In fact, there is almost no hard evidence for midlife crisis other than a few small pilot studies conducted decades ago, Barbara Hagerty writes in her new book, Life Reimagined.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: At middle age, he wrote, the sowing is behind; now is the time to reap.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The philosophy professor says it is as relevant today as when it was first written many centuries ago.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Sugar, alcohol and tobacco, economist Adam Smith once wrote, are commodities which are nowhere necessaries of life, which have become objects of almost universal consumption, and which are, therefore, extremely popular subjects of taxation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Cracker Jacks has been gamifying its snack food by putting a small prize inside for more than 100 years, he adds, and the turn-ofthe- century steel magnate ( ' ,  巨头) Charles Schwab is said to have often come into his factory and written the number of tons of steel produced on the past shift on the factory floor, thus motivating the next shift of workers to beat the previous one.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As a person who writes about food and drink for a living, I couldn't tell you the first thing about Bill Perry or whether the beers he sells are that great.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We do our absolute best with a piece of writing, and come as close as we can  to the ideal.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The intimate  nature of genuine criticism implies something about who is able to give it, namely, someone who knows you  well enough to show you how your mental life is getting in the way of good writing.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The author gradually improved his writing by avoiding fancy language.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Somewhere along the way I set aside my hopes of writing that flawless essay.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps the point of writing the flawless  essay was not to give up, but to never willingly finish.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: My mother said she would help me with my writing, but first I had to help myself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I was lucky enough to find a critic and teacher who was willing to make  the journey of writing with me.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Franz Kafka once said: Writing is utter solitude ( ' , 独处 ), the descent into the cold abyss ( ' , 深渊 ) of  oneself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: For each assignment, I was  to write the best essay I could.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Criticism, at its best, is deeply personal, and gets to the heart of why we write the way we do.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Constructive criticism gives an author a good start to improve his writing.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But what I learned,  and what stuck with me through my time teaching writing at Harvard, was a deeper lesson about the  nature of creative criticism.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As she neared the end of her prison sentence, a well-known columnist wrote that she was paying her dues, and that there is simply no reason for anyone to attempt to deny her right to start anew.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A writer should polish his writing repeatedly so as to get closer to perfection.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So I stopped shouting and bluffing, and slowly my writing improved.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: My mother's criticism had shown me that Kafka is right about the cold abyss, and when  you make the introspective ( ' , 内省的 ) descent that writing requires you are not always pleased by  what you find.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I am sure I wrote essays in the later years of high school without  my mother's guidance, but I can't recall them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He could not watch television except for two programs aweek, could not play with his friends after school until he finished his homework, and had to read two books a week and write book reports about them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Bailly encouraged his young apprentice to learn to read and write.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But in his short lifetime, which ended exactly 184 years ago today, he would forever revolutionize French gourmet food (美食), write best-selling cook books and think up magical dishes for royals and other important people.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But it might be time to unlearn that training 一 this summer, a group of culture addicts, artists and community organizers are inviting New Yorkers to write all over the walls of an old house on Governor's Island.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C
